name: Tartle's Deep Sea Fish Kebab
description:
In this retro arcade style game, Bob the diver descends into the darkness of the sea to battle Poseidon's minions and win back the ocean from the mutants of the deep. Fight with sword and fish but beware! The ocean is a strange place indeed. Over 100 different fish, 10 levels and a good old fashioned boss fight.

This was my first game. I have learned SO much since making this. I hope you see that a lot of heart went into every little pixel. I will always look back on it fondly. Enjoy! And if you like it let me know.
